1.ogDesc: I just completed CryptoZombies Lesson 1 and learned the basics of coding a game on Ethereum. Take a look at the first zombie in my army!

2.pageTitle: My CryptoZombie {{ .ZombieName }} just ate a CryptoKitty and leveled up!
2.ogDesc: I just completed CryptoZombies Lesson 2, and added a reanimated CryptoKitty to my zombie army. Come take a look!

3.ogDesc: I just completed CryptoZombies Lesson 3! My zombie army is growing...

4.ogDesc: I just completed CryptoZombies Lesson 4! My zombie won its first battle!
